name: Verify Fix for DEF-004: Paper Obscuring Neuros Terminal
description: Verifies that the paper asset does not obscure the Neuros terminal.
testObjective: Confirm that the defect is fixed and the terminal is accessible.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Progress into the 0b region via the hibernation transition sequence.
Enter the cockpit area containing the Neuros terminal.
Observe that the paper asset is positioned on the floor instead of the wall.
Click the paper to reposition it back onto the wall.
Attempt to interact with the Neuros terminal.
steps.expected: The paper should not overlap or block any interactable terminals or UI elements.
